name: When You're A Baby With Anger Issues But You Can Only Express It In Physical Violence - The Game
name_original: When You're A Baby With Anger Issues But You Can Only Express It In Physical Violence - The Game
description:
Otherwise known as The Angry Baby Game

Your mum has left you alone! Now is your best chance to commit violent and horrible destruction against the totally real, not imaginary city laid out in front of you.... before bedtime, of course.

Credits

3D assets made by Aaron - CodeLineNull

2D assets made by Cathreen - Cathreen

Audio assets made by Freddy - TerminalOath

Scripts and Unity programming done by Will - SwillMith
